name: Clones (itch) (Neon)
description:
This game is made for minijam 103.

Attention!

If the game does not advance to the next level, try moving the cursor

In this game you need to kill all your clones: they are completely repeating after you and you need to kill all them using this mechanic.

Blue guy is you, red guys are your clones.

LMB - shoot

Version 1.0.0
